summary: Replacer for the prisoner robes (roughspun robes)
descriptionHtml:
My First and probably only mod, this is a replacer for the prisoner robes, was done by trial an error I have some Photoshop knowledge but that\'s about it.

[Requirements]
UNP bodies
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

[Install]
To install just copy the contents of the folder to your data folder in your installation directory as with any other mod .

[Usage]
Just get the roughspun robes and wear them, these are given to the player when starting the game or forced on you when you get jailed and sent to cidhna mine.

[Notes]
This mod was made for personal use but I wanted to share it in case someone would like it.

I have only tested this in my machine I have many mods installed no conflicts so far.

I used one of the many files the art of magika (http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040) mod but at this point is very little what remains as the original mod maybe nothing remains other than a very few little details, never the less all credits to them.

The first version texture looks glossy, I would like it to make it less glossy but I have tried several things without success as I said I\'m a total n00b when comes to modding (suggestions welcome), but for some people they would prefer it this way as it gives the sensation of a really expensive but worn out clothe :) , the improved version is totally matte and works like a charm.

Cheers!
author: crasher23
